title: Close-up on Kuwait
creator_contributor_role: Kuwait Oil Company Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Industries - Middle East
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Oil industry - History
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Middle East - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Middle East - Politics and government
description: From Kuwait more oil is shipped annually than from any other oil port in the world, bringing in return a wealth of manufactured goods from other countries. A Government Development Board ensures that the country as a whole shares this new prosperity in the free State medical service, schools, and research into cultivation of desert areas.
